column1: Infancy and Early Childhood Development MSc
column3: UCL Great Ormond Street Institute of Child Health
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis programme explores the main theories, methods and research findings relating to prenatal issues, infants and young children from a variety of perspectives, including psychology, education, and health. It includes approaches to assessment and intervention, typical and atypical development.About this degreeYou will learn about the development of infants and young children (in utero life to five years of age) from the view of a range of disciplines, including psychology, education, medical, health and the social context.
